Description: Handmade Meroitic black-burnished cup with a flat base, tapering walls and direct rim. Exterior burnished and decorated with incised and impressed decoration filled with white: an impressed line of rectangular dots 2mm below the rim, below which is uneven, roughly incised cross-hatching in the centre of the body. Above this on opposite ends are two triangular impressed patterns made of impressed rectangular dots, one with lines below made of rectangular dots; on the final two sides are three impressed oval dots.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2003 10 Apr-31 Aug, Barcelona, CaixaForum, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan 2003/4 23 Sep-4 Jan, Madrid, Sala de Exposiciones de la Fundacio, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan
